sentences.en: "Wait a damn minute," Mindy spat. "Nobody said anything about staying overnight."
sentences.cn: “该死的，等一下”，明迪愤愤地说道，“谁也没说过要过夜。”

sentences.en: A man in my position has nothing to fear from a nobody like you.
sentences.cn: 在我这样职位的一个男人没什么好怕像你这样一个无名之辈的。

sentences.en: Drew made some remarks to nobody in particular and said goodbye.
sentences.cn: 德鲁说了一些不针对任何人的话就告辞了。

sentences.en: For a few seconds nobody said anything.
sentences.cn: 有几秒钟大家都沉默无语。

sentences.en: I knocked on the door but nobody answered.
sentences.cn: 我敲了敲门，但没人应门。

sentences.en: Nobody else believed that they had tried to rub out the pope.
sentences.cn: 其他人都不相信他们试图杀死教皇。

sentences.en: Nobody else turned up till a quarter past ten.
sentences.cn: 直到10点一刻，其他人才露面。

sentences.en: Nobody ever lost money by overestimating the public's prurience.
sentences.cn: 从未有人因为高估公众的好色之心而赔钱。

sentences.en: Nobody had thought him capable of that kind of thing.
sentences.cn: 谁都没想到他能干出那种事情来。

sentences.en: Nobody is perfect, and everyone acts thoughtlessly on occasion.
sentences.cn: 人无完人，谁都难保不偶尔疏忽一次。

sentences.en: Nobody knows who is in control of the club.
sentences.cn: 没人知道是谁掌管着这家俱乐部。

sentences.en: Nobody should be trumpeting about chemical weapons.
sentences.cn: 任何人都不应大肆鼓吹化学武器。

sentences.en: Nobody was allowed to eat in the Empress Dowager's presence.
sentences.cn: 在皇帝遗孀面前任何人不得进餐。

sentences.en: Surely nobody would suggest turning him out of the house.
sentences.cn: 当然不会有人建议把他从房子里赶出去。

sentences.en: The saddest thing in the world is a little baby nobody wants.
sentences.cn: 世上最让人难受的莫过于小婴儿遭到遗弃。

sentences.en: This child is nobody's child until someone makes her theirs officially.
sentences.cn: 在有人办理正式手续认领以前，这个孩子不属于任何人。

sentences.en: To err is human, and nobody likes a perfect person.
sentences.cn: 是人都会犯错，而且谁也不喜欢完人。

words.tran_cn: 头；大人物；[建] 球形门柄

phrases.tran_cn: 没人能做到；那么别人也休想

trans.tran_en: If someone says that a person is a nobody, they are saying in an unkind way that the person is not at all important
